chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent:
|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| ![mysql](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/wavefront-img/mysql_90px.png) | Real-time **MySQL** status.  These statistics are collected via Telegraf from the database tables in MySQL server.  For more detailed description and control over statistics collected, visit [MySQL input plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql). |

charts.name: Uptime
charts.description: Total uptime in days for MySQL instances selected.

charts.name: Instance(s) reporting
charts.description: Total number of MySQL server instances sending metrics to wavefront.

charts.name: Connection(s)
charts.description: Active connections to the Instance(s) selected.

charts.name: Schema(s)
charts.description: Total number of schemas for the selected MySQL instances.

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: sum(count(count(ts(mysql.perf.schema.read, server="${0_instance_scope}"), server, schema, table), server, schema, table))

charts.name: Connected User(s)
charts.description: Number of users connected to selected instance(s).

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: sum(ts(mysql.users.connections, server="${0_instance_scope}" and user="${6_user_scope}"), server) / max(ts(mysql.variables.max.connections, server="${0_instance_scope}"), server) * 100

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: sum(at("now", ts(mysql.aborted.connects, server="${0_instance_scope}")) - at("start", last(ts(mysql.aborted.connects, server="${0_instance_scope}"))))

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: rate(ts(mysql.perf.schema.table.io.waits.total.insert, server="${0_instance_scope}" and schema="${2_database_scope}" and name="${4_table_scope}")) + rate(ts(mysql.perf.schema.table.io.waits.total.delete, server="${0_instance_scope}" and schema="${2_database_scope}" and name="${4_table_scope}")) + rate(ts(mysql.perf.schema.table.io.waits.total.fetch, server="${0_instance_scope}" and schema="${2_database_scope}" and name="${4_table_scope}")) + rate(ts(mysql.perf.schema.table.io.waits.total.update, server="${0_instance_scope}" and schema="${2_database_scope}" and name="${4_table_scope}"))

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: rate(ts(mysql.perf.schema.table.io.waits.seconds.total.insert, server="${0_instance_scope}" and schema="${2_database_scope}" and name="${4_table_scope}")) + rate(ts(mysql.perf.schema.table.io.waits.seconds.total.delete, server="${0_instance_scope}" and schema="${2_database_scope}" and name="${4_table_scope}")) + rate(ts(mysql.perf.schema.table.io.waits.seconds.total.fetch, server="${0_instance_scope}" and schema="${2_database_scope}" and name="${4_table_scope}")) + rate(ts(mysql.perf.schema.table.io.waits.seconds.total.update, server="${0_instance_scope}" and schema="${2_database_scope}" and name="${4_table_scope}"))

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: rate(ts(mysql.perf.schema.read, server="${0_instance_scope}" and schema="${2_database_scope}" and table="${4_table_scope}" and perf_query=external_lock_waits_total))

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: rate(ts(mysql.perf.schema.write, server="${0_instance_scope}" and schema="${2_database_scope}" and table="${4_table_scope}" and perf_query=external_lock_waits_total))

chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent: **Note:** *This dashboard is provided by Wavefront. It's not directly editable, which lets us deploy new versions without affecting any of your customizations. If you want to make your own version, click ![pencil](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/wavefront-img/pen-icon.png) **> Clone** and give the dashboard a new URL*.
